id.description: A unique identifier of this Email Template.

version.description: An incremented counter of the templates created for this email.

emailName.description: The name of the email this template belongs to.

lastModifiedDate.description: The date that this template was last modified.

lastModifiedBy.description: The name of who had last modified this email template.

activationDate.description: The date that this template was activated.

isActive.description: State of this email template version.
